page.title: 07Badlesmere: Local Government
page.content: The bulk of the area lies within the boundary of the Sheldwich Badlesmere & Leaveland Parish Council. The N.E. area towards Shepherds Hill is within Selling and the area to the west of Leaveland is within Throwley. All come under Swale Borough Council. The S.E. corner is within Molash parish, under Ashford Borough Council. The l985 precept for Sheldwich B. & L. P.C. was Â£56O, spent as follows : Â£2OO each to the village halls for maintenance, Â£2O to the 3 churches under the Burial Act and the balance on subscription to the Kent Association of Parish Councils, Audit Commission, Clerk's fee and hall hire for meetings. Politically the area votes Conservative as would be expected from its mainly middle-class population.
